name: Google / new style

discussions.name: 能否排除Google图片搜索的页面？

style_setting_options.label: 拉伸图片背景(Drawing pictures)
平铺纹理背景(Tile picture)
style_setting_options.value:
/*背景（平铺 - Tile picture）*/
  body{background:url("/*[[background]]*/") repeat fixed 0% 0% transparent!important;}

style_setting_options.label: 单列显示 - single-row(1920x1080)
宽单列显示 - single-row(低于1920x1080)
特殊双列显示 - special two column(1920x1080)
双列显示 - two column(1920x1080))
小双列显示 - two column(低于1920x1080)

style_settings.label: 搜索项背景半透明(Search results with the translucent background)

style_setting_options.label: 结果项独立半透明 - the translucent background
style_setting_options.value:
/*搜索项背景半透明*/
  #cnt #center_col li.g,#brs,.mw #rhs li.g{box-shadow:0 0 2px gray;background:rgba(250,250,250,0.5)!important;transition:all 1s;/*[[radius]]*/}

style_settings.label: 搜索项边框(border of search results)
